2) ant <name of testfile> ---> =

This way, my first idea was to use a prope=

default value, that could be overriden by using a "-=
Dtestfile" flag. 

But there is another detail here: everybody in the compa=
ny is used to 
makefiles, which they activate by typing "build". In order t=
o 
maintain this experience, I created a shell file which just calls 
ant, =
sending a parameter, this way:

In order to use the flag, I thought =
of rewriting the shell file like

he build command, the property becames blank.

That's why I posted the ques=
tion, ok? But I think to preserve

 of treating the blank case, 
so I guess I should convince the other guys t=
o use "ant" and that's
